Change: Time dimension does not generate bounds automatically anymore – use cdms.setAutoBounds('on') -
CurveGrids can be supplied in the axis list.
Added conversion routines: rect => curve => generic
MV works with curvilinear grids
Can read grids from scrip remap files
getMesh returns a transposed mesh grid if requested.
On reading grids from files, check for cell convexity. Where that fails by default fix cells that straddle the 0 / 2pi boundary.
Added routines to write grids to external files in scrip format
Trapped seg faults on closed file objects.
Fixed memory leaks.
New tutorials
Now builds by default under Linux, updated to Version 3.4
A number reflecting selection/operation order appears next to selected variable
Templates and Graphic Method Listbox available (on/off) in Variables and Calculator area
Template editor accessible from VCDAT (click and drag technology)
Graphic Method Editors updated, preview/reset option added
4 mode: 1-user defined layout; 2- Browse Variable; 3- Data Manipulation; 4- Graphics Display
Layout changed, now has mode for plot edititng, letting you copy/paste and edit existing template and method
Annotation pop-up available, with preview/reset/apply/cancel
Page Layout Table to control what is displayed on the VCS Canvas, can turn on/off plots with one click
update to handle two or more on a page
Can read from a file
Can save to a file
Handled automatically
Added gctp package to vcs, 28 new types of projection avalaible
Template editor by clicking
Added writeScripGrid, readScripGrid can read from a SCRIP mapping file
Removed spurious calendar error
TransientAxis getCalendar returns DefaultCalendar if none specified. This is consistent with FileAxis.getCalendar()
Data can now be anywhere on user's space
New module, allows array indexing, e.g:C=genutil.arrayindexing.get(A,B)
Added filters module, so far only “running average”, 121 and custom
fixed a bug in linear regression when trend is 0, probability are not set to missing
Updated external Packages to their latest versions, see README files
Mac OS X “offically” supported
Fix CDMS build for FreeBSD
Added --cdms-only option to express_install.
Now can build indiviudal package or exclude some
--list option added
--help option in install_script
if no dimensions are present, then show the single vaule in the Defined Variables window
Overlay applies, use page layout for other types
Different mode of variable selection single/multiple
Remove the 1-Plot, 2-Plot, 3-Plot, 4-Plot per page
Simple binary file reader added
Can read column arranged ascii files
Save netcdf now has browser to go between directories
Simple ascii file reader added
New interface to user menu, more robust and intuitive
Added limited recordings of the functions (not available on beta)
Now can specify levels just like in isofill
Now has legend otpion (i.e can specifiy where to  put values)
Linewidth option added where line are controlled
User can click on the plot and get worldcoordinate/index values, and actual value
picker selector, let you pick non contiguous values
Yearly and xDaily Time Bounds setting, plus accept either slab or axis
Added F2PY, fortran wrapper
--HDF= option let user point to HDF libraries
Source code distributed but not installed
Replacing the eval call for the exec call. Now the user can enter any command

Fix for the automatic Numeric and MA conversion to MV. The user now has a choice to convert Numeric and MA to MV. That is, the user will need to select the "Automatic Conversion to MV" toggle in the "Preferences" menu to turn this feature on or off
Very High Resolution Continent Files generated via GMT are available on the web
Scaling, now can scale fonts
Bg option works
Implemented isClose().
Automatically built
VTK (beta version) added to distrib, not built by default this is experimental
Now can pass arguments at init time
Retains user settings
Predefined Region
Can define colors using intensiy
GUI updated
Projection accessible
standard dev added to xaxis
taylor control the xtic/ytic/cticks
Auto now works again (no more blank canvas)
Improved thread support
Added –nofiles, --execfile option
Added --notrim-lat option

Raise error if nonrectangular grid has no bounds associated
Added gridftp protocol
fixed times.setTimesBoundsMonthly for end of month storage
Vertical Interpolation Tools (sigma2pressure)
Package of interactive graphing tools. IaGraph will create line plots, scatter plots, and contour plots
Added R (statistical package) sources to distrib, not built by default
safe/nosafe problem solved, version controled before passing the argument

New module, interface to scrip regridder
Icons tools added
Keep (or not) Windows in front of main window
Align isLatitude, isLongitude test with CF convention
fixed a bug for TimeComponent 18, the seasonal weights used in computing the annual means were slightly off
Added Rpy package, works if you have R on your system
Pbmplus replaced with netpbm on Linux and Mac systems
Geometric Mean, Median and Rank functions added
Fixed multiplier annotation for 1D plots.
Support for chemistry attributes
Exit Popup to retain settings (can be turned off)
Option pull down from main menu was changed to “Preferences”
bug fix for pan and zoom
Ratio options now supported, let user definean y/x ratio or if lat/lon let vcs find a good one
Handles fortran NaN
Changed annotation so a blank text field will print nothing in on the Canvas
Extension bug fix, if levels set after ext_1
Taylordiags single precision ok now

Updated doc
0 means no marker
fixed taylordiagrams.script and also listelements('taylordiagram') now works (x.show returns None)
Fixed the cycle process for DRS files. Must close DRS files before you open them again.
